== Ubuntu on Dell Dimension n-Series Desktop ==
Since initially announced, many people have reported problems and various work-arounds when using different Gnu/Linux distributions on the n-Series Dell desktops. This is an attempt to list any resources related to using Ubuntu on these machines.

* <nowiki>[[http://www.dell.com/content/topics/segtopic.aspx/e510_nseries?c=us&cs=19&l=en&s=dhs|Dell Dimension n-Series]]</nowiki>: E520, E521, C521
* <nowiki>[[http://www.dell.com/content/products/features.aspx/dimen_n?c=us&cs=04&l=en&s=bsd|Dell Dimension]]</nowiki> C521n, E521n
* HardwareSupportMachinesDesktopsDell

'''Web sightings'''
* <nowiki>[[http://linux.slashdot.org/linux/07/01/24/0141211.shtml|Slashdot]]</nowiki> - 2006-01-24

=== Issues ===
==== USB mouse & keyboard lockup ====
This problem seems to be solved by upgrading to the latest Dell BIOS version 1.1.4 (dated 2007-01-01). Nice new year's gift :)
* <nowiki>[[http://support.dell.com/support/downloads/download.aspx?c=us&cs=04&l=en&s=bsd&releaseid=R142794&SystemID=DIM_P4_E521&os=WW1&osl=en&deviceid=308&devlib=0&typecnt=1&vercnt=3&formatcnt=1&libid=1&fileid=190574|BIOS upgrade for E521]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://support.dell.com/support/downloads/download.aspx?c=us&cs=04&l=en&s=bsd&releaseid=R142795&SystemID=DIM_P4_C521&os=WW1&osl=en&deviceid=308&devlib=0&typecnt=1&vercnt=4&formatcnt=1&libid=1&fileid=190570|BIOS upgrade for C521]]</nowiki>

If you don't have any operating system, not even the FreeDOS that is supposed to come with those systems, you can download a FreeDOS ISO image suitable for CD-ROM burning and booting:
* http://www.freedos.org/freedos/files/

Also see:
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.17/+bug/67734|Bug report and solution]]</nowiki> for USB mouse/keyboard lockups
* <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=1959501&postcount=76|Solution for USB mouse/keybaord lockups]]</nowiki> on Dimension E521
* <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=1932475&postcount=74|Workaround for USB mouse/keyboard lockups]]</nowiki> on Dimension E521
